attributes.action: Lower the prices that energy firms are charging us and do more to protect the countries most vulnerable citizens living in fuel poverty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Nearly everyone of us is paying huge amounts a month in energy bills while energy firms are making billions of pounds in profits. Just because we need energy does not mean energy firms can charge the amounts we are currently paying. These are harsh financial times and its a slap in the face to the British public that while we struggle to pay our bills energy companies are paying out huge bonuses to its chief executives.
